actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to provide relief for servicemembers with respect to contracts for cellular phone service, and for other purposes.
short_title: Servicemembers' Cellular Phone Contract Fairness Act of 2006

summary.text: Servicemembers' Cellular Phone Contract Fairness Act of 2006 - Amends the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to allow members of the Armed Forces who are called to active duty for a period of not less than 90 days to cancel or suspend their cell phone contracts without incurring early termination or reactivation fees.

titles.title: Servicemembers' Cellular Phone Contract Fairness Act of 2006
A bill to amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to provide relief for servicemembers with respect to contracts for cellular phone service, and for other purposes.
